name: Assassino Rivelato
description:
NOTICE: At the moment this game can only be played with a controller.  The keyboard and mouse controls do not seem to be working (Even though I definitely tested them right before building the game) so sorry for the inconvenience.

Assassino Rivelato is a Gameboy style, 8-bit, noir game set in the era of the 1940s.  With all the bells and whistles of the genre, such as stoic private eyes, wealthy and confusing  family trees, and  myriad red herrings.  Uncover the culprit to the murder of Mary-Tracy Pockets after she turns up mysteriously deceased following her family's viewing of the opera Assassino Rivelato!

Hello, this is StaticQuo!  I am new to the world of game development and decided to join a game jam to try and break into the community.  Accordingly, this is my first ever game.  Also accordingly, the gameplay is absurdly rudimentary and it's not too fun... but it's finished!  And that's what's important at this stage.  Hopefully as I take on and (ideally) complete more and more projects, I know I'll improve so I'm content with getting something finished.  I appreciate anyone who's willing to sit this one through to the end, even with its fairly short length.  Thank you for any support and good luck with your own jam entries!
